Name: Soundscape VR
About the game: Soundscape VR is the musical metaverse, home of hyper-immersive visual arts and sound experiences. Since 2014, Soundscape VR has existed to delight with the power of tech art delivered at its ultimate level. Since then the platform has been continually updated and improved by an independent team of passionate artists & music lovers. No ads, no corporate sponsorship, no data theft; just the world's most advanced audiovisual experiences, available free. - Explore the future of music, today. Play solo or with friends - Level up & customize your avatar in a next-gen concert experience - Escape to fantasy worlds brought to life by music, a unique performance every time - Enjoy Magic Mirror curated performances presented in VR or play your own songs with Freeplay - Experience Artist Link live VR concerts & festivals elevating solo artists with world-class productions - Connect to Soundscape Live, the world's first Metaverse Art Installation, on its sixth year of VR artistic innovation - PC Mode coming soon - Prepare for the next level of Soundscape with all new possibilities Be sure to check out our Discord at to join in with the Soundscape music community and discover new music, new friends, plus all our latest announcements for upcoming shows.
